name: Mechanical Difficulties (Pre-Alpha)
description:
Mechanical Difficulties takes what's best about real-time strategy games and combines it with the best parts of a first-person shooters.

Be the leader of your base - manage your resources, build structures, create an army and conquer the enemy base! Sounds like a real-time strategy game? Better yet! You get to be on the ground, inside the action! 

Play a 1v1 multiplayer match against your opponent.
Build a base that is indestructable; set up traps that make your opponent feel like a fool; build an army that will wipe out your enemy base; and use your shooter skills to outplay your opponent at every encounter.

In Development...

Keep in mind that because this game is in early development, you might need to ask your friend to play against you. There might not be anyone online to play against when you want to try alone.
